title: (BUG REPORT) Twisted fate W
body: Twisted Fate's W (pick a card) does not cause Runann's hurricane to fire its 2 bolts when you use the buffed AA, (i know obviously the blue/red/gold cards would not proc on the bolts, but they should still fire 2 normal bolts when he uses his AA, also not sure if its a bug or not but TF can hit his blue/red/gold card while blinded.

replies.body: That's because his W is an ability not an auto attack.
